text: Ivvare inai vaipporil perumpalorukku, avarkalutaiya kulantaikalaiye kolai ceyvatai avarkalutaiya teyvankal alakakki vaittullana. Avarkalai nacappatutti, avarkalutaiya markkattaiyum kulappattilakkivittana. Allah natiyiruntal avarkal appatic ceytirukka mattarkal. Enave (napiye!) Nir avarkalaiyum, avarkalutaiya poyyana kurrukkalaiyum vittu vilaki vituviraka
